meta.title: WPF RichTextBox supporting smileys
meta.excerpt: An editor supporting smileys is most important feature nowadays. Any chat editors should render smileys from a piece of text. For example, “:)” denotes a smiling face. This article helps you to create an extended rich text editor which support smileys. [Read more]
